sense.def:
Defiance
je vedênje, ki kaže, da nekoga nismo pripravljeni ubogati ali nas ne skrbi njegovo neodobravanje.

seg.quote: In a gesture of defiance, I wore a black mini-skirt.

sense.def:
Če nekaj storimo
in defiance of a rule
, tisto storimo, čeprav je prepovedano.

seg.quote: The houses were erected in defiance of all building regulations.
